option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
APPENDIX A: RESOURCE PERSONS
This section acknowledges the individuals who provided valuable assistance, guidance, and support throughout the development and implementation of the AIA Fitness Gym Management System.
________________________________________________________________________________
RESOURCE PERSONS
Mr. Carl Ramos Owner, AIA Fitness Gym
AIA Fitness Gym was established on August 2, 2024. As part of this capstone project, Mr. Carl Ramos agreed to collaborate on the development of a dedicated mobile and web application to improve membership management and member engagement.
Ms. Sandra Staff Member, AIA Fitness Gym
As a staff member at AIA Fitness Gym, Ms. Sandra provided valuable insights into daily gym operations and front-desk procedures. Her practical knowledge of member registration and check-in processes helped inform the design of the administrative web dashboard and QR code functionality.
Mr. Dennis Gym Coach, AIA Fitness Gym
Mr. Dennis, a gym coach at AIA Fitness Gym, contributed his expertise in fitness training and workout program design. His guidance on exercise selection and progression validated the personalized workout generation algorithms implemented in the mobile application.
________________________________________________________________________________
The development team extends sincere gratitude to all resource persons for their time, expertise, and continuous support throughout the project lifecycle. Their contributions were instrumental in ensuring that the system meets the practical needs of both gym management and members.
End of Appendix A

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
APPENDIX F: USER'S GUIDE
This guide provides step-by-step instructions for using the AIA Fitness Gym Management System. The system consists of a mobile application for gym members and a web-based dashboard for administrative staff.
_______________________________________________________________________________
PART 1: MOBILE APPLICATION (For Gym Members)
### 1.1 Getting Started
#### 1.1.1 Creating an Account
**Step 1: Download and Install** - Download the AIA Fitness Gym app from the provided source - Install the application on your Android device (requires Android 8.0 or higher) - Open the app to begin
**Step 2: Sign Up** 1. On the welcome screen, tap **"Sign Up"** 2. Fill in the registration form: - Full Name - Email Address - Phone Number (Philippine mobile format: 09XX-XXX-XXXX) - Password (minimum 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character) - Confirm Password 3. Check the box to agree to Terms and Conditions 4. Tap **"Sign Up"** button 5. Wait for confirmation message
**Step 3: Complete Your Profile** 1. After successful registration, you'll be directed to profile setup 2. Select your gender 3. Enter your personal information: - Age - Weight (kg) - Height (cm) 4. Select your fitness level: - Sedentary (little or no exercise) - Lightly Active (light exercise 1-3 days/week) - Moderately Active (moderate exercise 3-5 days/week) - Very Active (hard exercise 6-7 days/week) - Extremely Active (very hard exercise & physical job) 5. Choose your fitness goal: - Lose Weight - Build Muscle - General Fitness - Improve Endurance 6. (Optional) Add any health issues or physical limitations 7. Tap **"Save"** to complete your profile
---
### 1.2 Logging In
**For Regular Login:** 1. Open the app 2. Enter your registered email address 3. Enter your password 4. Select **"User"** as user type 5. Tap **"Login"**
**Forgot Password?** 1. On the login screen, tap **"Forgot Password?"** 2. Enter your registered email address 3. Tap **"Send Reset Link"** 4. Check your email for password reset instructions 5. Follow the link to create a new password
---
### 1.3 Main Dashboard
After logging in, you'll see the main dashboard with:
**Top Section:** - Profile picture and name - Current membership status - Membership expiration date (if active)
**Quick Actions:** - **Membership** - View or purchase membership plans - **Workout** - Access personalized workout plans - **QR Code** - Your digital gym access pass - **Profile** - Edit your personal information
**Activity Feed:** - Recent workouts completed - Membership updates - System notifications
---
### 1.4 Purchasing a Membership
**Step 1: View Available Plans** 1. From the dashboard, tap **"Membership"** 2. Browse available membership packages: - **Daily Pass** - Single day access - **Monthly Plans** - 1, 3, or 6 months - **Personal Training Packages** - Includes PT sessions with a coach
**Step 2: Select a Plan** 1. Tap on the plan card to view details 2. Review: - Duration - Price - Features included - Number of PT sessions (if applicable) 3. Tap **"Select"** if you want this plan
**Step 3: Review and Agree** 1. Review your selected plan details 2. Read the Terms and Conditions 3. Check the box to agree 4. Tap **"Confirm"**
**Step 4: Choose Coach (For PT Packages Only)** 1. A dialog will appear asking how to select a coach: - **"Let the system choose"** - Automatically assigns an available coach - **"Choose my coach"** - Browse and select from available coaches 2. If choosing manually: - Browse coach profiles - View their specialties and ratings - Tap on your preferred coach - Tap **"Select Coach"**
**Step 5: Complete Payment** 1. You'll be redirected to the PayMongo payment page 2. Choose your payment method: - Credit/Debit Card - GCash - GrabPay - Other supported payment methods 3. Enter payment details 4. Review payment summary 5. Tap **"Pay Now"** 6. Wait for payment confirmation
**Step 6: Confirmation** - Once payment is successful, your membership activates immediately - You'll receive a confirmation message - Your dashboard will update with new membership status - Your QR code will be generated for gym check-ins
---
### 1.5 Accessing Your QR Code
**What is the QR Code?** Your QR code is your digital gym pass. Staff will scan it when you enter the gym.
**To Access Your QR Code:** 1. From the dashboard, tap **"QR Code"** 2. Your unique QR code will be displayed 3. Show this to staff at the gym entrance
**Tips:** - Save a screenshot for offline access - QR code works even without internet connection - Each code is unique to your account - Don't share your QR code with others
---
### 1.6 Using the Workout Planner
#### 1.6.1 Generating Your Personalized Workout
**How It Works:** The app creates a custom workout plan based on your: - Fitness level - Goals - Health conditions - Current week of progression
**To Generate Your Workout:** 1. From the dashboard, tap **"Workout"** 2. The system will automatically check: - If you have an active workout for the current week - If your profile has changed since the last workout - If you've completed your previous workout 3. If a new workout is needed, the app will generate one automatically 4. You'll see a list of exercises with: - Exercise name and image/GIF - Sets and reps - Instructions - Estimated duration
**To Adjust Workout Difficulty:** 1. On the workout list screen, tap the settings icon (if available) 2. Adjust the difficulty slider: - Move left to make it easier - Move right to make it harder 3. Tap **"Regenerate"** to create a new workout with adjusted difficulty 4. The app will remember your preference for future workouts
---
#### 1.6.2 Starting a Workout Session
**Step 1: Review Your Workout** 1. On the workout list screen, review all exercises 2. Check the total duration estimate 3. Make sure you have necessary equipment
**Step 2: Start the Session** 1. Tap **"Start Workout"** button 2. The app will show a ready countdown (3, 2, 1...) 3. Voice guidance will announce the first exercise
**Step 3: Follow Along** 1. Each exercise screen shows: - Exercise name and animation - Current set and rep count (or timer) - Instructions - Progress bar 2. The app will: - Count down exercise duration - Announce remaining time (voice) - Show rest periods between exercises - Automatically move to next exercise
**During the Workout:** - **Pause** - Tap the pause button if you need a break - **Skip** - Swipe or tap skip to move to next exercise - **Previous** - Go back to previous exercise if needed - **Info** - Tap info icon to view detailed instructions
**Step 4: Complete the Workout** 1. After the final exercise, you'll see a completion screen 2. Summary includes: - Total duration - Exercises completed - Calories burned (estimate) 3. Tap **"Finish"** to save the workout 4. Your workout history is automatically updated
---
### 1.7 Profile Management
#### 1.7.1 Viewing Your Profile
1. From the dashboard, tap **"Profile"** or your profile picture 2. View your information: - Personal details - Fitness information - Membership status - Workout history
#### 1.7.2 Editing Your Profile
**To Update Personal Information:** 1. Tap **"Edit Profile"** 2. Modify any field: - Full Name - Phone Number - Profile Picture (tap camera icon to change) 3. Tap **"Save Changes"**
**To Update Fitness Information:** 1. Tap **"Edit Fitness Profile"** 2. Update: - Current weight - Fitness level - Fitness goals - Health conditions 3. Tap **"Save Changes"** 4. Note: Updating fitness info will regenerate your workout plan
**To Change Password:** 1. Go to Profile Settings 2. Tap **"Change Password"** 3. Enter current password 4. Enter new password 5. Confirm new password 6. Tap **"Update Password"**
---
### 1.8 Workout History
**To View Past Workouts:** 1. Go to Profile or Dashboard 2. Tap **"Workout History"** 3. Browse your completed workouts: - Date completed - Duration - Exercises performed - Weekly progress
**To View Weekly Progress:** - The app tracks your progression week by week - Each week, workouts become slightly more challenging - View your improvement over time in the progress chart
---
### 1.9 Notifications
**Types of Notifications:** - Membership expiration reminders (7 days, 3 days, 1 day before) - Workout completion congratulations - New features or announcements - Coach messages (for PT members)
**Managing Notifications:** 1. Go to Profile Settings 2. Tap **"Notifications"** 3. Toggle notification types on/off 4. Choose notification sound
---
### 1.10 Troubleshooting
**Problem: Can't log in** - Check your email and password are correct - Ensure you have internet connection - Try "Forgot Password" to reset - Contact gym staff if issue persists
**Problem: QR code not displaying** - Check your membership is active - Ensure you've completed payment - Try logging out and logging back in - Contact support if issue continues
**Problem: Workout won't generate** - Ensure your profile is complete - Check internet connection - Try force-closing and reopening the app - Update to the latest version
**Problem: Payment failed** - Check payment method has sufficient funds - Try a different payment method - Contact PayMongo support - Reach out to gym admin for manual processing
---
## PART 2: WEB DASHBOARD (For Administrators)
### 2.1 Administrator Access
#### 2.1.1 Logging In
**Requirements:** - Admin credentials (provided by system administrator) - Computer or tablet with modern web browser - Internet connection
**Login Steps:** 1. Open web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge recommended) 2. Navigate to the admin dashboard URL 3. Enter your admin email address 4. Enter your admin password 5. Click **"Login"** 6. System will verify you have admin privileges 7. You'll be redirected to the dashboard
**Important Notes:** - Only accounts with admin privileges can access the dashboard - Regular user accounts will be rejected even with correct passwords - Keep your admin credentials secure and don't share them
---
### 2.2 Dashboard Overview
After logging in, you'll see the main dashboard with three key metrics:
**Metric Cards:** 1. **Active Memberships** - Current number of active members 2. **Today's Check-ins** - Number of members who checked in today 3. **New Members This Month** - New registrations this month
**Navigation Menu:** - Dashboard - Overview and statistics - Membership - Manage members, coaches, and packages - Attendance - View check-in records - Transactions - Payment history - Feedbacks - Member feedback and ratings
**Updates in Real-Time:** - All metrics update automatically when data changes - No need to refresh the page
---
### 2.3 Managing Members and Coaches
#### 2.3.1 Viewing Members
**To Access Member List:** 1. Click **"Membership"** in the sidebar 2. You'll see a table with all members and coaches
**Table Columns:** - Profile Picture - Type (Member or Coach) - Full Name - Email - Phone Number - Membership Plan - Status (Active/Inactive) - Actions (Archive button)
**Sorting the Table:** - Click any column header to sort by that column - Click again to reverse sort order - Active sort column is highlighted
**Searching Members:** 1. Use the search box at the top 2. Type member name, email, or phone 3. Results filter automatically
---
#### 2.3.2 Viewing Member Details
**To View Full Member Information:** 1. Click on any member row in the table 2. A modal will open showing: - Profile picture - Personal information - Contact details - Fitness profile - Current membership status - Membership history - Assigned coach (if applicable)
**Membership Details Section:** - Click on the "Membership" column cell to view: - Current plan - Start date - Expiration date - Payment method - Transaction history
---
#### 2.3.3 Editing Member Information
**To Edit a Member:** 1. Click on the member row to open details modal 2. Click **"Edit"** button 3. Modify fields as needed: - Full Name - Email Address - Phone Number - Membership Status (Active/Inactive) - Assigned Coach (for PT members) 4. Click **"Save Changes"** 5. Changes sync to mobile app immediately
**Important:** - Changing membership status from Active to Inactive will: - Revoke gym access - Disable QR code check-ins - Keep member data for records - Status changes are logged for auditing
---
#### 2.3.4 Managing Coaches
**To View Coaches:** 1. Go to Membership page 2. Coaches are displayed in the same table as members 3. "Type" column shows "Coach"
**To Add a New Coach:** 1. Click **"Add Coach"** button 2. Fill in coach information: - Full Name - Email Address - Phone Number - Specializations (e.g., "Weight Training, Cardio") 3. Set temporary password 4. Click **"Create Coach Account"** 5. Coach will receive login credentials via email
**To Edit Coach Information:** 1. Click on coach row 2. Click **"Edit"** button 3. Modify information 4. Click **"Save Changes"**
**Coach Features:** - Coaches have their own login to view assigned clients - Can track client workout progress - Can communicate with clients through the app
---
#### 2.3.5 Archiving Members
**When to Archive:** - Member has permanently left the gym - Account is inactive for extended period - Member requested account deletion
**To Archive a Member:** 1. Find the member in the table 2. Click the Archive icon (box with arrow) 3. Confirm archival in the dialog 4. Member is moved to Archives
**Archived Members:** - Data is preserved but account is deactivated - Cannot log in to mobile app - Can be restored if needed
**To View Archives:** 1. Click **"View Archives"** button 2. Browse archived members 3. Use search to find specific archived accounts
**To Restore an Archived Member:** 1. Open Archives modal 2. Find the member 3. Click **"Restore"** button 4. Member is moved back to active list 5. Can log in again immediately
---
### 2.4 Managing Membership Packages
#### 2.4.1 Viewing Packages
**To Access Packages:** 1. Go to Membership page 2. Click **"Manage Packages"** tab 3. View all available membership packages
**Package Information Displayed:** - Package name - Type (Daily, Monthly, PT) - Duration (days/months) - Price - Number of PT sessions (if applicable) - Status (Active/Inactive)
---
#### 2.4.2 Adding a New Package
**To Create a Package:** 1. Click **"Add Package"** button 2. Fill in package details: - **Package Name** (e.g., "3-Month Standard") - **Type**: Select from dropdown - Daily - Monthly - Personal Training - **Duration**: - For Daily: 1 day - For Monthly: 1, 3, 6, or 12 months - **Price**: Amount in Philippine Pesos - **PT Sessions**: Number of sessions (for PT packages only) 3. Click **"Create Package"** 4. Package appears immediately in mobile app
---
#### 2.4.3 Editing Packages
**To Modify a Package:** 1. Click on the package card 2. Click **"Edit"** button 3. Modify any field: - Name - Duration - Price - Sessions 4. Click **"Save Changes"**
**Important Notes:** - Price changes don't affect existing memberships - Only new purchases use the updated price - Members with active memberships keep their original price
---
#### 2.4.4 Deactivating Packages
**To Hide a Package from Members:** 1. Click on the package 2. Toggle **"Active"** switch to OFF 3. Package is hidden from mobile app 4. Existing members with this package are unaffected
**To Reactivate:** 1. Click on the package 2. Toggle **"Active"** switch to ON 3. Package appears in mobile app again
---
### 2.5 Attendance Monitoring
#### 2.5.1 Viewing Today's Check-ins
**To Access Attendance:** 1. Click **"Attendance"** in sidebar 2. View today's check-in records
**Information Displayed:** - Check-in time - Member name and photo - Membership type - Membership status - Check-in method (QR scan)
---
#### 2.5.2 Viewing Attendance History
**To View Past Check-ins:** 1. Go to Attendance page 2. Use the date picker to select a date 3. Click **"Filter"** 4. View all check-ins for that date
**To View Specific Member's Attendance:** 1. Use the search box 2. Type member name 3. View their check-in history 4. Export to CSV if needed
---
#### 2.5.3 Manual Check-in (Alternative)
**If QR Scanner is Unavailable:** 1. Go to Attendance page 2. Click **"Manual Check-in"** button 3. Search for member by name or email 4. Click **"Check In"** next to member's name 5. Confirm check-in 6. Record is saved with timestamp
---
### 2.6 Transaction History
#### 2.6.1 Viewing Payments
**To Access Transactions:** 1. Click **"Transactions"** in sidebar 2. View all payment records
**Transaction Details:** - Date and time - Member name - Package purchased - Amount paid - Payment method (PayMongo, GCash, etc.) - Transaction ID - Status (Success/Failed/Pending)
---
#### 2.6.2 Filtering Transactions
**By Date Range:** 1. Click on "Date Range" filter 2. Select start date 3. Select end date 4. Click **"Apply Filter"**
**By Payment Method:** 1. Click "Payment Method" dropdown 2. Select method (All, Credit Card, GCash, GrabPay, etc.) 3. Transactions filter automatically
**By Status:** 1. Click "Status" dropdown 2. Select (All, Success, Failed, Pending) 3. View filtered results
---
#### 2.6.3 Exporting Transaction Reports
**To Generate Reports:** 1. Apply desired filters 2. Click **"Export"** button 3. Choose format: - CSV (for Excel) - PDF (printable) 4. File downloads automatically 5. Open in appropriate program
**Report Contents:** - All visible transactions based on current filters - Total revenue calculated - Payment method breakdown - Date range summary
---
### 2.7 Member Feedback
#### 2.7.1 Viewing Feedback
**To Access Feedbacks:** 1. Click **"Feedbacks"** in sidebar 2. View all member feedback and ratings
**Feedback Information:** - Member name - Rating (1-5 stars) - Comments - Date submitted - Response status (Responded/Pending)
---
#### 2.7.2 Responding to Feedback
**To Reply to a Member:** 1. Click on feedback entry 2. Read the member's comments 3. Type your response in the text box 4. Click **"Send Response"** 5. Member receives notification in mobile app 6. Feedback marked as "Responded"
---
#### 2.7.3 Filtering Feedback
**By Rating:** 1. Click "Rating" filter 2. Select star rating (1-5 or All) 3. View filtered feedback
**By Status:** 1. Click "Status" filter 2. Select: - All - Pending Response - Responded 3. View filtered results
**By Date:** 1. Use date picker 2. Select date range 3. Click **"Filter"**
---
### 2.8 System Settings
#### 2.8.1 Changing Admin Password
**To Update Your Password:** 1. Click your profile icon (top-right) 2. Click **"Account Settings"** 3. Click **"Change Password"** 4. Enter current password 5. Enter new password 6. Confirm new password 7. Click **"Update Password"** 8. Log in again with new password
---
#### 2.8.2 Managing Admin Accounts
**To Add New Admin:** 1. Go to Settings 2. Click **"Admin Accounts"** 3. Click **"Add Admin"** 4. Enter admin details: - Full Name - Email - Initial Password 5. Click **"Create Admin"** 6. New admin can log in immediately
**To Remove Admin Access:** 1. Go to Admin Accounts 2. Find the admin 3. Click **"Revoke Access"** button 4. Confirm removal 5. Account loses admin privileges immediately
---
### 2.9 Reports and Analytics
#### 2.9.1 Generating Reports
**Available Reports:** - Monthly Revenue Report - Membership Growth Report - Attendance Summary Report - Member Retention Report - Popular Package Report
**To Generate a Report:** 1. Click **"Reports"** in sidebar (if available) 2. Select report type 3. Choose date range 4. Click **"Generate"** 5. View report on screen 6. Click **"Export"** to download
---
#### 2.9.2 Dashboard Analytics
**Overview Statistics:** - Total active members - Total revenue this month - Average check-ins per day - Membership conversion rate - Most popular package
**Trend Graphs:** - Revenue over time (line graph) - New members per month (bar chart) - Check-in patterns (heat map) - Package distribution (pie chart)
---
### 2.10 Troubleshooting (Admin)
**Problem: Cannot log in to admin dashboard** - Verify you have admin privileges - Check email and password are correct - Clear browser cache and cookies - Try a different browser - Contact system administrator
**Problem: Member data not updating** - Refresh the page (F5) - Check internet connection - Verify member made changes in mobile app - Clear browser cache - Check if member is logged into mobile app
**Problem: Transactions not showing** - Check selected filters (may be filtering out results) - Verify date range includes transaction dates - Refresh the page - Check if payment was actually completed
**Problem: Cannot export reports** - Check browser pop-up blocker settings - Ensure sufficient permissions - Try a different browser - Check available disk space - Verify export format is supported
**Problem: Real-time updates not working** - Check internet connection stability - Refresh the page - Clear browser cache - Check if using supported browser version - Verify Firestore connection status
---
## PART 3: GENERAL INFORMATION
### 3.1 System Requirements
**Mobile App (Android):** - Android 8.0 (Oreo) or higher - Minimum 2GB RAM - 100MB free storage space - Internet connection (Wi-Fi or mobile data) - Camera permission (for profile pictures) - Location permission (optional, for gym proximity features)
**Web Dashboard:** - Modern web browser: - Google Chrome 90+ - Mozilla Firefox 88+ - Safari 14+ - Microsoft Edge 90+ - Minimum 1280x720 screen resolution - Stable internet connection - JavaScript enabled - Cookies enabled
---
### 3.2 Privacy and Security
**Data Protection:** - All user data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS/SSL) - Passwords are securely hashed - Payment information is processed through PayMongo (PCI DSS compliant) - Personal data is stored in Firebase with security rules
**User Privacy:** - Profile information is only visible to gym staff - Workout data is private to each user - Email addresses are not shared with third parties - Users can request data deletion at any time
**Payment Security:** - Payments processed through PayMongo secure gateway - Credit card details are never stored on our servers - Transaction data is encrypted - PCI DSS Level 1 compliant
---
### 3.3 Terms and Conditions Summary
**Membership Terms:** - All memberships are non-refundable - Memberships cannot be transferred to another person - Unused days/sessions do not carry over - Membership auto-expires on expiration date - Gym reserves right to suspend membership for policy violations
**User Conduct:** - Members must follow gym rules and regulations - Equipment must be used properly - Appropriate gym attire required - Respect other members and staff - No unauthorized photography/recording
**Liability:** - Members use gym facilities at own risk - Medical clearance recommended before starting workout program - Gym not responsible for personal injuries - Gym not liable for lost or stolen personal items
---
### 3.4 Support and Contact
**For Members (Mobile App Users):** - **Technical Support**: Contact gym reception - **Membership Issues**: Email membership@aiafitness.com - **Payment Problems**: Contact PayMongo support or gym admin - **App Bugs**: Report through app feedback section
**For Administrators:** - **Technical Issues**: Contact IT support team - **System Access**: Contact system administrator - **Training**: Request admin training session - **Feature Requests**: Submit through admin feedback form
**Gym Contact Information:** - **Address**: [Gym Physical Address] - **Phone**: [Gym Contact Number] - **Email**: info@aiafitness.com - **Hours**: [Operating Hours] - **Website**: www.aiafitness.com
---
### 3.5 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
**Q: Can I use the app without a membership?** A: You can create an account and view packages, but you need an active membership to access workouts and gym facilities.
**Q: How long does it take for my membership to activate?** A: Memberships activate immediately after successful payment. Your QR code is generated within seconds.
**Q: Can I change my workout difficulty?** A: Yes, you can adjust difficulty in the workout settings. The app will regenerate your plan based on the new difficulty level.
**Q: What happens when my membership expires?** A: You'll receive notifications 7, 3, and 1 day before expiration. After expiration, your QR code won't work for check-ins, but you can still log in and purchase a new membership.
**Q: Can I get a refund if I can't use my membership?** A: All memberships are non-refundable as stated in Terms and Conditions. However, you may discuss special circumstances with gym management.
**Q: How do I change my assigned coach?** A: Contact the gym admin through the app or in person. Admins can reassign coaches through the web dashboard.
**Q: Is my payment information safe?** A: Yes, all payments are processed through PayMongo, a PCI DSS Level 1 certified payment gateway. We never store your card details.
**Q: Can I share my QR code with friends?** A: No, each QR code is unique and tied to your account. Sharing QR codes violates the Terms of Service and may result in membership suspension.
**Q: What if I lose my phone?** A: Log in from a new device using your email and password. Your membership and QR code will be available on the new device.
**Q: How accurate are the workout calories burned estimates?** A: Calorie estimates are approximations based on exercise intensity, duration, and your profile data. Individual results may vary.
---
### 3.6 Tips for Best Experience
**For Mobile App Users:** - Keep your profile information up to date for accurate workout generation - Complete workouts consistently for best progression - Take progress photos to track your fitness journey - Enable notifications to stay updated on membership expiration - Screenshot your QR code for faster gym entry - Report any bugs or issues through the feedback section - Update the app regularly for new features and bug fixes
**For Administrators:** - Regularly review and respond to member feedback - Monitor daily check-ins to track gym traffic patterns - Generate monthly reports for business analysis - Keep membership packages updated with current pricing - Archive inactive members to keep the database clean - Back up important data regularly - Train staff on using the admin dashboard properly
---
## APPENDIX: Quick Reference Cards
### Quick Reference: Mobile App
**Login Screen:** - Sign Up → Register new account - Login → Enter credentials - Forgot Password → Reset via email
**Dashboard:** - Membership → Buy/view plans - Workout → Start exercise session - QR Code → Show at gym entrance - Profile → Edit information
**During Workout:** - Pause → Take a break - Skip → Next exercise - Info → View instructions - Stop → End session early
---
### Quick Reference: Admin Dashboard
**Main Navigation:** - Dashboard → Overview stats - Membership → Manage members - Attendance → View check-ins - Transactions → Payment history - Feedbacks → Member reviews
**Common Tasks:** - Add Member → Click "Add Member" button - Edit Member → Click member row → Edit - Archive Member → Click archive icon - Add Package → Manage Packages → Add - View Reports → Reports → Generate
---
### Quick Reference: Keyboard Shortcuts (Admin Dashboard)
**Navigation:** - `Ctrl + H` → Home/Dashboard - `Ctrl + M` → Membership page - `Ctrl + A` → Attendance page - `Ctrl + T` → Transactions page
**Actions:** - `Ctrl + N` → New member/package - `Ctrl + S` → Save changes - `Ctrl + F` → Search/Filter - `Esc` → Close modal/dialog
*(Note: Keyboard shortcuts may vary by browser)*
---
**End of User's Guide**
*For additional support or questions not covered in this guide, please contact AIA Fitness Gym support team.*
*Document Version: 1.0* *Last Updated: November 2025*
